page.title: 06Our Police Force
page.content: The first police station was a hut which was accidentely pushed off a train in 1901,when soldiers were coming back from the Boer War.There were two policemen at that time,and there was no transport at all except an old bicycle between them. Now there is a newer and more modern police station which was built in 1922 with an extention made in 1946. There are now 6 P.C's,1 W.P.C,3 detectives and 2 sergeants.There are also 2 police motor-cycles which are Honda's, 3 police cars which are all Ford Escort's,and 1 car for the C.I.D. There are 8 police houses. The houses numbered from 1-3 used to be flats for policemen who were bachelors.The other houses were built in 1964 and are quite new. by MARK WILLIAMS.
